name: The SpaceQ Capsule Hotel
description:
Discover the future of travel at Sydney’s iconic Space Q Capsule Hotel.
Perfectly positioned in the heart of Australia’s most beautiful city, Space Q Capsule Hotel delivers convenient, cool and cost effective short-stay accommodation in an unbeatable Sydney location.

The capsule hotel concept allows guests to stay in a private, self-contained ‘pod’ complemented by modern shared spaces including a kitchen, living and entertainment area, male and female bathrooms and laundry.
Boasting 100 ultra modern single and double bed capsules.
Each capsule is equipped with the latest technology, including ceiling lights, mirror lights and multiple USB ports. Accessed using a private keycard, your capsule allows you to control the air ventilaion and store small personal items in an in-capsule safe. Larger pieces of luggage can be stored in a secured locker.


Please be advised that the reception hour is 10:30 am to 4:30 pm. The check in time is 11 am  to 4:30 pm. Guest who require late check in (after 4:30 pm) MUST contact hotel for confirmation and obtain self-check in password & instruction in advance. Otherwise you will NOT be able to check in. Please manage your time accordingly and inform us about your arrival time. 


Reception opening hours 10:30 am - 4:30 pm
Check in time 11:00 am - 4:30 pm
Check out time Before 11:00 am
Lost, damage and fail to return room key card – AUD 20 fee
All guest is required to show valid photo ID (passport or Australian drivers’ licence) upon check in. We will scan the guest’s photo ID.
All guests must use their own card to pay for the reservation and show the card upon check in.
If guests did not use their own card, we will need the card holder’s photo ID, photo of the card (front and back side) and signed authorisation letter.

houseRules.notes:
Important?
Please be advised that the reception hour is 10:30am to 4:30pm. The check in time is 11am to 4:30pm. Guest who require late check in (after 4:30 pm) MUST contact hotel for confirmation and obtain self-check in password & instruction in advance. Otherwise you will NOT be able to check in. Please manage your time accordingly and inform us about your arrival time

Check in
â¢	Please be advised that the reception hour is  9:30am to 3:30pm. If you arrive after 11pm, an AUD 15 late check in fee will apply. We can have our staff waiting for you until 11:59pm, after which time you won't be able to check in. Please manage your time accordingly and inform us about your arrival time.
â¢	Reception desk and access hotel will close at 3:30pm. Check in after 3:30pm is considered as Late Check In and $15 late check in fee applies. Late check-in guests can call Urgent Contact Number +61 92117784 or use our intercom to call upon arrival. The reception can wait for guest until 11:59pm, after which time the guest won't be able to check in. Please manage arrival time accordingly and inform the hotel about the arrival time.
* 

Check out 
â¢	Hotel check-out time is before 11:00 am.
â¢	If you have not checked out of the room by 11:00am and you do not request an extension or have a reservation for the next night, Space Q personnel may have to pack your belongings to be placed in the reception, so the room can be cleaned for new arrivals. 
â¢	Guests are required to return the Room Key Card to the staff at reception when check out. 
â¢	Guests checking out before 8:00am can return Room Key Card to 'Room Card Return" Box at the reception. 

â¢	Capsule room will be completely cleaned and serviced before guest check in. If you are staying for multiple days and would like to have sheets to be changed during your stay with us, please inform the staff at reception a day in advance, otherwise capsule rooms are not entered by our hotel staff. 
â¢	Temporary luggage storage is available at reception free of charge before check-in or after check out. Please note that the hotel do NOT assume any responsibility for any loss or damage to your belongings. Please make sure you lock your luggage. 
â¢	Each guest is provided with a room key card to access the front door of the hotel, guest's capsule room and guest's assigned locker. Loss of room key card will incur a $20.00 replacement fee.
â¢	Bath Towel can be rented upon request at reception and $10 will be charged for missing bath towel.
â¢	Please keep your capsule room locked at all times. For the convenience of the Guest, electronic safety safe are provided in the capsule room to store any valuables.
â¢	Hotel will not in any way whatsoever be responsible and do not assume any liability for any damage to or loss to the guest's belongings or any property from either the capsule room, locker, or the safe or any part of the hotel for any cause including theft.  
â¢	Items left behind by hotel guests and found after departure will be kept for collection by hotel for up to 14(fourteen) days. After that time, unclaimed items will be disposed by hotel as seen fit. 
â¢	Entertainment in mixed company of private visits from unregistered persons, in hotel guest capsule room, is NOT permitted. For the safety of each guest, ONLY the hotel staff is authorized to do this. 
â¢	All visiting guests are required to register at the reception with valid photo ID (passport or Australian drivers' licence) . No visitors are allowed inside the hotel after 11:00 pm. If guests did not use their own card, we will need the card holder's photo ID, photo of the card (front and back side) and signed authorisation letter.
â¢	All guests must use their own card to pay for the reservation and show the card upon check in.
â¢	For the enjoyment and safety of the guests, pets are NOT allowed in Space Q Capsule Hotel.
â¢	Space Q Capsule Hotel cannot accommodate guests under the age of 18. 
â¢	The Guest shall be solely liable and responsible to the hotel, its other guests, visitors, agents and servants for all loss financial or otherwise and damage that may be caused by any hazardous goods including but not limited to weapons, explosives, flammable objects, poisons, stoves and other ignitable devices, petroleum fuels, etc or as a result of the guests' own negligence and non-observance of any instructions.
â¢	Gambling, prostitution, use of drugs including marijuana are strictly prohibited on hotel premises.
â¢	If it is discovered or even suspected that you have violated this rule you will be removed from the hostel immediately and if necessary the police will be called. There will be no refunds for lodging when you are removed from the hotel.
â¢	The guest will be held responsible for any loss or damage to the hotel property caused by themselves, their guests or any person for whom they are responsible.
Hotel Management's Rights
â¢	The hotel has the right to request guests and/or third parties, to vacate capsule room or leave the hotel premises, whenever not respecting any of the hotel policies, or behaving improperly at the discretion of the hotel management.
